metadata.title: CVE-2012-5855 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible
metadata.description: The SHAddToRecentDocs function in VideoLAN VLC media player 2.0.4 andearlier might allow user-assisted attackers to cause a denial of service(crash) via a crafted file name that triggers an incorrect string-lengthcalculation when the file is added to VLC.  NOTE: it is not clear whetherthis issue crosses privilege boundaries or whether it can be exploitedwithout user interaction.

criterions.comment: vlc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
